mapper.select: SELECT TOP 10 a.article_seq articleSeq, a.board_seq boardSeq, a.thread_seq threadSeq, a.reply_pos replyPos, a.title , a.content , a.ip , isnull(a.read_count , 0 ) readCount , a.writer_id writerId , a.writer_name writerName , is_del isDel , convert(char(10),a.reg_dt,102 ) regDt , DATEDIFF( day, a.reg_dt , getdate() ) AS days FROM dbo.tb_board a WHERE board_seq = #{boardSeq} AND is_del = #{isDel}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dbo.tb_boardfile ( file_id , article_seq, cop_seq ) VALUES ( #{fileId} , #{articleSeq}, #{copSeq} )
